summary: Basic follower mod for the Character of Gabriel Angelos, Chapter Master of the Blood Ravens Space Marines.
descriptionHtml:
The current Chapter Master of the Blood Ravens Space Marine Chapter and former Captain of that Chapter's 3rd Company. Angelos was responsible for slaying the Chapter's former Chapter Master and Chief Librarian, Azariah Kyras, who had become a pawn of Chaos.

He now wields the Master Crafted Daemonhammer God-Splitter, slaying Mankind's enemies with this mighty Force Weapon.

Gabriel Angelos is a typical Astartes: proud, valiant, faithful, protective of his Battle-Brothers and trusted allies and the bane of any who dares stand against him or the Blood Ravens.

____________________________________________________

Character modeled after the famed Chapter master as close as I could get him, hair and certain scars (and nodes) being the only exception.


"Knowledge is power. Guard it well." - Blood Ravens warcry

____________________________________________________
[heading]Description[/heading]
A basic follower mod, Gabriel Angelos is a 2 handed weapon's brute, favoring power over swiftness. Taller than your average Nord. Gabriel is a tower of a man, ready to bring the might of the emperor to your foes!

He will level up with you (at 80%) to the max level.

Well skilled in archery and 2 Handed, Gabriel makes a very resourceful and useful companion, charging into battle with his Blood Raven's Cloak rippling.

Standalone version of the Thunder Hammer is available as well.

Gabriel can be found inside the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

____________________________________________________
[heading]Installation[/heading]

Simply extract the data file to your Skryim's one and hey presto, a hulk of a Blood Raven's Chapter Master is awaiting you.


____________________________________________________
[heading]Planned[/heading]

A custom set of quests with unique dialogue for character and a hopefully very exciting and challenging boss battle.

____________________________________________________
[heading]Credits[/heading]

Thunder Hammer - Soyuz & Mikael
THQ and Relic for Gabriel Angelos character
author: Gen Plague Lord
